resources.string:
1. Press green START button; SIMON will give the first signal.

 2. Repeat the signal by pressing the same lens.

 3. SIMON will duplicate the first signal and will add one.

 4. Repeat these two signals by pressing the same lenses.

 5. SIMON will duplicate these first two signals and add one.

 6. Continue in this manner as long as you can repeat each se-quence of signals correctly
